data.title: Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner Deals
data.meta_description: Check out our current offers and coupons for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Login to your Wendy’s account or download our app to start saving.

In-App or Online

Deals don't get much better than this.

Login to your online Wendy's account or download our app for iPhone or Android and create a new Wendy's account to start saving with these exclusive offers.

And if you create a new account now, you’ll also get an offer for a FREE 10 PC. Nuggs with any purchase AND 200 bonus Rewards points added to your first purchase. (FYI: 200 points is enough for a free Frosty®️ or a 4 PC. Nugg. Just sayin’.)

Delivery deals delivered.

We got deals. We got delivery. Sometimes we got deals on delivery. See what we specifically got here.

Check for Promos >

Wendy’s® Rewards

With Wendy’s Rewards, every Wendy’s you get earns points towards free Wendy’s for future you. And we all know the best Wendy’s is free Wendy’s. Do future you a favor and:

Rewards yourself today >

Deals on Meals

Rediscover why our Biggie™ Bag, the OG value meal, never goes out of style.

View our Meal Deals >

FAQ

Offers & Coupons

Can I print the offers that are in my mobile app?

Offers in the app are for app use only and cannot be printed.

How often will I receive new offers in the app?

Offers are refreshed periodically. Check back often to see what offers are available.

Can I use more than one coupon/offer on the same order?

Coupons may not be combined with other offers.

Can I get coupons emailed to me?

Coupons are not available via email. Offers are available on our website to use with a mobile order, and in our mobile app.
